tasks.title: Go to Amsterdam
tasks.description: A livid and bright city with bicycles everywhere.

tasks.title: Go to London
tasks.description: One of the most important cities in the world with lots of great Pubs :D.

tasks.title: Go to New York
tasks.description: Probably the busiest city in the world. Lots of beer and pizza!

tasks.title: Go to San Francisco
tasks.description: Such a charming and lovely city. Looks amazing!

tasks.title: Go to Paris
tasks.description: The city of love, cheese, wine... Gotta got to the Eiffel Tower.
